name: Castle defender (itch) (javornikanze)
description: Castle defender is a tower defense game, where you play a knight who needs to protect the castle from enemies. To survive, you can kill the enemies with your character, but you will also want to place down some defense units like barriers and cannons which will help you defend the castle. There is 4 different stages, each with its own unique looks and difficulty. Can you take on the challenge? Good luck!
